content.title: Invitations
content.data:
Why should I setup chat invitations?

Sending a personalized invitation is an easy and effective way of starting a chat with a visitor. The Invitation can appear in your chat window with a customized message and your agent’s photo. This makes it really easy to connect with your online visitors.

With invitations, you will:

  • Get more chats – the more personalized and targeted your chat invitation is, the higher the possibility of chatting with visitors
  • Turn visitors into customers – visitors that get invited to a chat are 6.3 times more likely to convert into customers than the ones who don’t; 61% of those customers convert within the first chat
  • Increase the customer satisfaction – your customers will leave your site happy and will return back to your site. They will refer their friends and colleagues about great customer experience which might yield to increase of new visitors.
  • Sell more – the more chances you have, the higher number of buyers you will eventually get

Selecting a chat window type

The chat window can be either embedded or popup. Each group can have its own invitation view. Invitation’s view and behavior depend from chat window types. You can change the Type of chat window using Settings -> Chat -> Chat window.

Creating an invitation for embedded chat window

Follow the steps below to create your invitation:

  1. You can change invitation’s settings in section Settings -> Chat -> Invitations. There you can see how the invitation will look in visitor’s browser.

  1. Turn the automatic invitation off/on. If automatic invitation is turned on then the visitor will get the invitation automatically after 20 seconds spent on your website. Otherwise an agent can send the invitation to the visitor himself.

A visitor could get the invitation later than 20 seconds. It depends if there are available agents at the present time.

  1. Enter a custom invitation phrase
  2. Click the Save button

Creating an invitation for popup chat window

Follow the steps below to create your invitation:

  1. You can change the invitation’s settings in section Settings -> Chat -> Invitations. There you can see how the invitation will look in your visitor’s browser.

  1. Turn the automatic invitation off/on. If automatic invitation is turned on then a visitor will get the invitation automatically after 20 seconds spent on your website. Otherwise an agent can send the invitation to the visitor himself.

A visitor could get the invitation later than 20 seconds. It depends if there are available agents at the present time.

  1. Select an invitation image.
  1. You can also upload your own invitation image. When uploading an image you can define the placement of the invitation message and define the area where the visitor can click to close the invitation window.
  1. Enter your custom invitation phrase
  2. Select the invitation position
  3. Select a transition effect
  4. Click the Save button
